name: Gingerbread with Lemon Sauce
steps: In a mixing bowl, combine the first four ingredients; mix well. Combine the dry ingredients; add to molasses mixture alternately with hot water. Pour into a greased 13x9 in baking pan. Bake at 350 F for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack.

Meanwhile, in a saucepan, combine the first five sauce ingredients until smooth. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 1-2 minutes or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Stir a small amount of hot mixture into egg yolks. Return all to pan, stirring constantly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until a thermometer reads 160 F. Remove from the heat; stir in butter, lemon juice and peel. Serve with warm cake. Refrigerate leftover sauce.
